name: Parasmehta.GitHub.io
body:
### Paras Mehta
I am a PhD candidate at the Databases and Information Systems working group at FU Berlin. My supervisor is [Prof. Agn√®s Voisard](http://page.mi.fu-berlin.de/voisard/desktop.html) 

### Previous
Till Sept 2014, I was a member of the European project [GEOCROWD] (http://www.geocrowd.eu).

### Research
My research is in applications of user generated geospatial data in alerting and personalization of information.

### Work with me
Currently open Master Thesis proposal - [Implementation and evaluation of an improved spatial keyword index](http://www.mi.fu-berlin.de/en/inf/groups/ag-db/Theses/spatial_keyword_index/index.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
